job_tasks.phrase: Modellen die voorspellen welke advertentie banner/creative het meest geschikt is voor een online bezoeker
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core task of developing predictive models for a specific business problem (ad suitability).

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor most likely converters/clickers van advertentie campagnes
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions building predictive models, a key task in traditional ML.

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor het voorspellen van leeftijd en gender van DPG Media online bezoekers obv geconsumeerde content
job_tasks.justification: Another instance of developing predictive models for user profiling based on content consumption.

job_tasks.phrase: Toevoegen van profile enrichments in batch & real-time flows in een big data environment
job_tasks.justification: This describes data manipulation and processing within a big data environment, fitting data engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Data pipelines & dashboards voor quality monitoring & alerting
job_tasks.justification: This refers to building data pipelines and monitoring systems, which falls under data engineering and operational aspects.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bouwt en onderhoudt ook data pipelines & werkt mee aan onze web applicaties.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates involvement in building and maintaining data pipelines and web applications, which are core software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: You build it, you run it mentaliteit (development & devops, infra-as-code, CICD, â€¦)
job_tasks.justification: This directly mentions DevOps practices like infra-as-code and CI/CD, which are part of MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Je analyseert requirements, experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
job_tasks.justification: This describes the end-to-end process of model development, from experimentation to implementation and presentation.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bouwt mee aan onze onderliggende data stack & data pipelines (python, PySpark, ElasticSearch, Terraform, Airflow,..)
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions building data stacks and pipelines using specific technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bouwt samen met de Data & ML engineers ons ML Ops platform uit
job_tasks.justification: This task is directly related to building and expanding an ML Ops platform.

job_tasks.phrase: Je integreert onze services met andere DPG teams die van onze data services gebruik maken
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of services with other teams, a core software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Indien gewenst, bouw je mee aan onze web-applicaties (voor interne & externe gebruikers) die onze data-producten ontsluiten
job_tasks.justification: This indicates contributing to web applications that expose data products, a software development task.

soft_skills.phrase: Je versterkt ons scrum team bestaande uit Product Owner, Scrum Master & 8 developers.
soft_skills.justification: Being part of a scrum team implies collaboration and communication.

soft_skills.phrase: Je neemt deel aan standups, refinements, retro's & demo's (2-week)
soft_skills.justification: Participation in scrum ceremonies is a direct indicator of collaboration and communication.

soft_skills.phrase: je presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
soft_skills.justification: Presenting results to both technical and business teams highlights communication skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Je neemt ownership & accountability voor bepaalde modellen, jobs & applicaties
soft_skills.justification: Taking ownership and accountability directly maps to the 'Ownership' aspect of this category.
Experimenting with different models implies a willingness to learn and explore new approaches.
Coaching others is a strong indicator of communication and collaboration skills.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on traditional ML tasks such as building predictive models for advertising, user profiling, and quality monitoring. While it mentions MLOps and data pipelines, there is no mention of Generative AI, LLMs, RAG, or related technologies. The tasks are predominantly in Macro-Category B (Model Development & Fine-Tuning, Data Engineering & Management) with some elements of Macro-Category A (Software Development & Integration, Operations & MLOps). Given the strong emphasis on predictive modeling and the absence of GenAI specifics, it aligns best with a Core ML Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about the types of models and tasks involved, explicitly mentioning predictive modeling and data pipelines. The absence of any Generative AI related terms makes the classification straightforward. The technologies listed also align with traditional ML and data engineering.
